nodes.text: The TreeFelling vibrosaw also known as the Tree Felling Vibro-Saw and the GLC 075 Vibro-Saw was a vibrosaw manufactured by the Greel Wood Logging Corporation. It was primarily designed for use by loggers working on the greel trees in the Pii system. It required two energy cells to operate. It was designed for clearing large vegetation, but it was sometimes used to saw through bulkheads during boarding actions. It could also be used as a weapon if needed.
